https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1zQXBbMbltvtEgmBELYjB0MWfU7.jpg This documentary chronicles Diomedes Díaz's rise as one of Colombia's most iconic singers, and his downfall after being accused of killing a fan. Broken Idol: The Undoing of Diomedes Díaz
